# FrameControl.DelayNumerator property

The numerator of the delay fraction; indicating the time to display the current frame, in seconds.

```csharp
public ushort DelayNumerator { get; set; }
```

## Remarks

If the the value of the numerator is `0` the decoder should render the next frame as quickly as possible, though viewers may impose a reasonable lower bound.
